data.name: WWE 2K22 - The Whole Dam Pack
data.detailed_description:
Whether rocking out, creating controversy, or soaring through the sky, all eyes will be on you with WWE 2K22's The Whole Dam Pack. This DLC pack is headlined by WWE Hall of Famer Rob Van Dam and joined by pop culture icon Machine Gun Kelly, social media megastar Logan Paul, WWE Superstars LA Knight, Xia Li, Commander Azeez and NXT’s Sarray.
Each playable Superstar comes with their own MyFACTION EVO cards.

The Whole Dam Pack is already included in the WWE 2K22 Season Pass.
data.about_the_game:

This DLC pack is headlined by WWE Hall of Famer Rob Van Dam and joined by pop culture icon Machine Gun Kelly, social media megastar Logan Paul, WWE Superstars LA Knight, Xia Li, Commander Azeez and NXT’s Sarray.
Each playable Superstar comes with their own MyFACTION EVO cards.

The Whole Dam Pack is already included in the WWE 2K22 Season Pass.
data.short_description: The Whole Dam Pack features Rob Van Dam, Machine Gun Kelly, Logan Paul, LA Knight, Xia Li, Commander Azeez, and Sarray. Each playable Superstar comes with their own MyFACTION EVO cards. The Whole Dam Pack is already included in the WWE 2K22 Season Pass.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3550 / AMD FX 8150 (AVX - Compatible processor)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: At least 4 GB Video Memory
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-4790 / AMD FX 8350 (AVX - Compatible processor)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 / Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: At least 6 GB Video Memory
